title: Watch: Los Angeles Homeowner Defends Family From Armed Criminals, Yet LAPD Is Revoking HIS Gun Permit
description:
The Constitution proves that we have an inalienable right to self-defense. But despite that, it is becoming increasingly clear that in many progressive-run cities, you have no right to protect yourself from criminals that may subsequently cause harm to you.

A man had his concealed carry permit revoked just days after using the firearm to defend himself and his family from would-be robbers outside their home in Los Angeles.

To say the very least, it is extremely backward when we have laws that interfere with the ability of law-abiding citizens to defend themselves against criminals.

Vince Ricci believes that the decision was made because of his use of the gun to protect his family, however, the sherif

title: Four black teens charged with murder of white Las Vegas teen,  could be tried as adults
description:
Four black teens are being charged with the murder of a white student outside of a Las Vegas high school. Prosecutors plan to try them as adults

As previously reported, Jonathan Lewis Jr. died days after he was found severely beaten by up to fifteen youthsl. Video of the attack was captured by bystanders and went viral on social media.

The New York Post is reporting Dontral Beaver, 16; Gianni Robinson, 17; Damien Hernandez, 17, and Treavion Randolph, 16, are facing murder charges in connection with Lewis's death.

In Nevada, a case is automatically moved to the adult system if a 16-year-old or 17-year-old is charged with murder, refe

title: Male captain of girls high school volleyball team reportedly booed after asking opponent: "Did my penis distract you?"
description:
The male captain of a Massachusetts high school girls' volleyball team is accused of making vulgar comments towards one of his female opponents, asking her in the heat of competition, "Did my penis distract you?"

And I know some of you are saying, "Hey Brodigan, don't you mean trans girl? Since trans girls are girls, this is no different than a cis girl asking, 'Did my titties distract you?'

No, see, we've opened a NEW front in the ongoing culture wars. Using rules put in place to encourage tolerance and inclusion and gay sh*t like equity, boys who are at best MID playing against other boys are now choosing to play on the girls' team without going through the trouble of identifying as one.
